overview:
As a Social Media marketing enthusiast, Iâ€™m currently the Digital Marketing Manager at Marc Ecko Enterprises in New York City.

I’ve spoken about Social Media at UNICEF, on a webinar for HubSpot & at various local conferences throughout Pittsburgh. I write articles about Social Media strategies as a contributing author on Mashable, the New York Times, HubSpot, Social Times, All Twitter, All Facebook, Business Insider, Ad Council, KISSmetrics, Social Media Examiner & Social Media Today.

Additionally, I volunteer as the Tech Tutor at the Pratt Area Community Council helping residents with special needs make the most of computers & the web. Contact me with any further inquiries about participating in speaking engagements or guest blogging.
